author: Staff Reporter
text:
The relatives of a TANGEDCO contract worker, who died while on duty on Saturday, blocked the main road in front of the Government Headquarter Hospital here demanding a government job to one of their family members and suitable compensation on Sunday.

Traffic was disrupted for more than half an hour. Later, revenue and police officials held a discussion with the agitators, who alleged that TANGEDCO officials neither came to the hospital nor met them so far. His wife Mallika insisted that the government should provide job to one of her family members for survival.

Subramani (40) of Y.M.R. Patti, slipped from a post while working on Karur Road at Nehruji Nagar. The body was removed to Dindigul GH for post-mortem. Their relatives refused to accept the body from the GH after the post mortem demanding an assurance from the government.

Mallika said her husband had worked in the TANGEDCO for the 13 years on contract basis.

After police intervention, the TANGEDCO officials interacted with family members and assured to take up the matter to the knowledge of the government. Later, they withdrew agitation and received the body.
title: Kin of deceased contract worker block road in Dindigul
